title: London's 2021 fireworks 🎆 Happy New Year Live! 🔴 BBC
author: BBC
description:
Subscribe and 🔔 to OFFICIAL BBC YouTube 👉 https://bit.ly/2IXqEIn
Stream original BBC programmes FIRST on BBC iPlayer 👉 https://bbc.in/2J18jYJ

As Big Ben strikes midnight, the nation comes together to welcome in the new year and light up the new year countdown to 2021.

New Year's Eve Fireworks 2021 | BBC

#BBC #FireworksLondon #BBCiPlayer #NewYearsEve #HappyNewYear2021 #2021

All our TV channels and S4C are available to watch live through BBC iPlayer, although some programmes may not be available to stream online due to rights. If you would like to read more on what types of programmes are available to watch live, check the 'Are all programmes that are broadcast available on BBC iPlayer?' FAQ 👉 https://bbc.in/2m8ks6v.

localize.description:
订阅和订阅官方bbc youtube https://bit.ly/2IXqEIn🔔👉

随着大本钟午夜钟声敲响，全国人民齐聚一堂，迎接新的一年，点亮2021年的新年倒计时。

除夕夜焰火2021|BBC

#BBC #FireworksLondon #BBCiPlayer #newyseve #HappyNewYear2021 #2021 

我们所有的电视频道和S4C都可以通过BBC iPlayer现场观看，尽管有些节目可能由于版权的原因无法在线观看。如果你想阅读更多关于哪些类型的节目可以现场观看的信息，请查看“所有在BBC iPlayer上播放的节目都可以吗？”常见问题https://bbc.in/2m8ks6v.👉
